entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to My Blog!!!

This is zhoujungis! This is my very first post.

If you have some problems to ask me, you can find me on GitHub.

About Me

I am Zhou Jun, a student from UCAS.

I am a person who loves technology and science, and I like travelling and photography. But I am a programming novice, if there is a chance, I hope to communicate with you!

About the Blog

Through this blog, I hope to share my learning and life problems and communicate with you. I hope you can make progress together with me through this blog.

About My Research

I mainly do work related to remote sensing and geographic information system, including remote sensing image classification, spatial analysis, webgis system, etc., which mainly involves in deep learning, system development and other related knowledge. I hope to have like-minded students to communicate with each other and make progress together.

The END!

Thank you very much!!!
entry.summary: Welcome to My Blog!!!
